categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic starships
Category:Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Pulsar was a Star Destroyer which was present at the Battle of Endor. Commander Dor Reder served aboard the ship as a junior officer, and Lieutenant Niclara Varnillian was a member of the ships's gunnery crew. Pulsar was forced to surrender after that battle, but members of the crew, including Reder and Varnillian, escaped Alliance to Restore the Republic custody.
